member.name: T:Semver.SemVersion
member.summary: A semantic version implementation. Conforms to v2.0.0 of http://semver.org/

member.name: M:Semver.SemVersion.#ctor(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Semver.SemVersion.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Semver.SemVersion.#ctor(System.Version)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The that is used to initialize the Major, Minor, Patch and Build properties.

member.name: M:Semver.SemVersion.Parse(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Parses the specified string to a semantic version.
member.param: If set to true minor and patch version are required, else they default to 0.
member.exception: When a invalid version string is passed.

member.name: M:Semver.SemVersion.TryParse(System.String,Semver.SemVersion@,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Parses the specified string to a semantic version.
member.param: When the method returns, contains a SemVersion instance equivalent to the version string passed in, if the version string was valid, or null if the version string was not valid.
If set to true minor and patch version are required, else they default to 0.
member.returns: False when a invalid version string is passed, otherwise true.

member.name: M:Semver.SemVersion.Equals(Semver.SemVersion,Semver.SemVersion)
member.summary: Tests the specified versions for equality.
member.returns: If versionA is equal to versionB true, else false.

member.name: M:Semver.SemVersion.Compare(Semver.SemVersion,Semver.SemVersion)
member.summary: Compares the specified versions.
member.returns: If versionA < versionB < 0, if versionA > versionB > 0, if versionA is equal to versionB 0.

member.name: M:Semver.SemVersion.Change(System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Make a copy of the current instance with optional altered fields.

member.name: P:Semver.SemVersion.Major
member.summary: Gets the major version.

member.name: P:Semver.SemVersion.Minor
member.summary: Gets the minor version.

member.name: P:Semver.SemVersion.Patch
member.summary: Gets the patch version.

member.name: P:Semver.SemVersion.Prerelease
member.summary: Gets the pre-release version.

member.name: P:Semver.SemVersion.Build
member.summary: Gets the build version.

member.name: M:Semver.SemVersion.ToString
member.summary: Returns a that represents this instance.

member.name: M:Semver.SemVersion.CompareTo(System.Object)
member.summary: Compares the current instance with another object of the same type and returns an integer that indicates whether the current instance precedes, follows, or occurs in the same position in the sort order as the other object.
member.param: An object to compare with this instance.
member.returns: A value that indicates the relative order of the objects being compared. The return value has these meanings: Value Meaning Less than zero This instance precedes in the sort order. Zero This instance occurs in the same position in the sort order as . i Greater than zero This instance follows in the sort order.

member.name: M:Semver.SemVersion.CompareTo(Semver.SemVersion)
member.summary: Compares the current instance with another object of the same type and returns an integer that indicates whether the current instance precedes, follows, or occurs in the same position in the sort order as the other object.
member.param: An object to compare with this instance.
member.returns: A value that indicates the relative order of the objects being compared. The return value has these meanings: Value Meaning Less than zero This instance precedes in the sort order. Zero This instance occurs in the same position in the sort order as . i Greater than zero This instance follows in the sort order.

member.name: M:Semver.SemVersion.PrecedenceMatches(Semver.SemVersion)
member.summary: Compares to semantic versions by precedence. This does the same as a Equals, but ignores the build information.
member.returns: true if the version precedence matches.

member.name: M:Semver.SemVersion.CompareByPrecedence(Semver.SemVersion)
member.summary: Compares to semantic versions by precedence. This does the same as a Equals, but ignores the build information.
member.returns: A value that indicates the relative order of the objects being compared. The return value has these meanings: Value Meaning Less than zero This instance precedes in the version precedence. Zero This instance has the same precedence as . i Greater than zero This instance has creater precedence as .

member.name: M:Semver.SemVersion.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified is equal to this instance.
member.param: The to compare with this instance.
member.returns: true if the specified is equal to this instance; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Semver.SemVersion.GetHashCode
member.summary: Returns a hash code for this instance.
member.returns: A hash code for this instance, suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures like a hash table.

member.name: M:Semver.SemVersion.op_Implicit(System.String)~Semver.SemVersion
member.summary: Implicit conversion from string to SemVersion.

member.name: M:Semver.SemVersion.op_Equality(Semver.SemVersion,Semver.SemVersion)
member.summary: The override of the equals operator.
member.returns: If left is equal to right true, else false.

member.name: M:Semver.SemVersion.op_Inequality(Semver.SemVersion,Semver.SemVersion)
member.summary: The override of the un-equal operator.
member.returns: If left is not equal to right true, else false.

member.name: M:Semver.SemVersion.op_GreaterThan(Semver.SemVersion,Semver.SemVersion)
member.summary: The override of the greater operator.
member.returns: If left is greater than right true, else false.

member.name: M:Semver.SemVersion.op_GreaterThanOrEqual(Semver.SemVersion,Semver.SemVersion)
member.summary: The override of the greater than or equal operator.
member.returns: If left is greater than or equal to right true, else false.

member.name: M:Semver.SemVersion.op_LessThan(Semver.SemVersion,Semver.SemVersion)
member.summary: The override of the less operator.
member.returns: If left is less than right true, else false.

member.name: M:Semver.SemVersion.op_LessThanOrEqual(Semver.SemVersion,Semver.SemVersion)
member.summary: The override of the less than or equal operator.
member.returns: If left is less than or equal to right true, else false.
